name: CopyFilesViaPSSession
description: Copies files using a Powershell Session.
author: ggarbuglia

inputs.name: server
inputs.label: Remote Machine
inputs.helpMarkDown: FQDN of the remote machine you want to reach (or the IP Address).

inputs.name: adminusr
inputs.label: Admin Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Administrator login for the remote machine.

inputs.name: adminpwd
inputs.label: Admin Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Password for administrator login for the remote machine.
It can accept variable defined in Build/Release definitions as '$(passwordVariable)'.
You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: targetpath
inputs.label: Target Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: A local path on the remote server.

inputs.name: excludetypeslist
inputs.label: Exclude Types List
inputs.helpMarkDown:
A comma separated list of wildcard file types to exclude.
Example: \*.bak,\*.log,\*.txt.

inputs.name: skipcertificatechecks
inputs.label: Skip Certificate Checking
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skip certificate validation for CommonName, Certificate Authority and Revocation
